page.title: 11LICHFIELD AUCTION MARKET
page.content: Each Monday the auction market is the scene of the livestock auction.The market deals in the sale of sheep,pigs and cattle.The buyers are principally local butchers and farmers. On the first Friday of each month an agricultural implement sale is held. This is one of the largest and most important in the country.Dealers attend this sale from nationwide.The site is also used for the auction of antique furniture.Contractors' plant sales and shrub sales are held regularly and there is a large poultry sale held at Christmas.A new building has just been erected for the auction of fine arts.
